record_type.description: Identifies the type of the resource.

organization_id.description: Uniquely identifies the organization that owns the resource.

status.description: Status of the ledger billing group report

report_url.description: External url of the ledger billing group report, if the status is complete

created_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was updated.
